title: Why Israel’s Violence Gets So Much Notice (It’s Not Antisemitism)
description:
The question of Israel is whether European colonialism can ever make peace with the rest of the world.

The post Why Israel’s Violence Gets So Much Notice (It’s Not Antisemitism) appeared first on The Intercept.

title: After House Speaker Mike Johnson Pushed Through Israel Aid Package, AIPAC Cash Came Flowing In
description:
The pro-Israel lobby donated around $95,000 to Johnson after he led the House passage of an extra $14 billion for Israel.

The post After House Speaker Mike Johnson Pushed Through Israel Aid Package, AIPAC Cash Came Flowing In appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The EPA Is Backing Down From Environmental Justice Cases Nationwide
description:
The agency has pumped the brakes on Civil Rights Act investigations out of apparent fear that a Louisiana challenge could make it to the Supreme Court.

The post The EPA Is Backing Down From Environmental Justice Cases Nationwide appeared first on The Intercept.
